titleStmt.title: An elegy upon the most lamented death of the right reverend Dr. John Gauden late lord bishop of Worcester; who deceased on Friday, September 19th. 1662. in Worcester.
titleStmt.author: Heath, James, 1629-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Gilbertson at the Bible in Giltspur-street without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Now deaths decrees seem'd to be out of date ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Bible in Giltspur-street without Newgate
